long_description: Designed for recreational kayaking, the Aries PFD from Kokatat offers a great balance of safety, freedom of movement and breathability. Tough Cordura(R) nylon outer shell stands up to the rigors of paddling; tough inner shell is smooth and comfortable against skin. PVC-free foam is soft and flexible, and it won't break down in a wet environment. Thin foam in lower back works with the high seat backs of many recreational kayaks, and overall low-profile fit works with your paddle stroke. Front lash tab, front zipper. The Kokatat Aries PFD is fully adjustable.
short_description: Designed for recreational kayaking, the Aries PFD from Kokatat offers a great balance of safety, freedom of movement and breathability.
